resources.string: The villager only has the ability to vote during voting period
You\'re not supposed to read this msg, because you\'re sleeping !!!
Each werewolf wakes up simultaneously during night, they need to vote the person they\'ll eat
When he dies, the hunter can choose to take one person to the grave with him.
The thief has the ability to switch the roles of two players.
"The Mayor's vote counts double. During voting period he has the veto if a decision cannot be made"
The witch can choose between 2 potion, one to save and one to kill. Both can be used only one time
Each night, the fortuneteller can see the role of one person
Select the character you want to know the role
Assassin is called during night and can kill a person. His goal is to be the sole survivor.
The pyromaniac can pour gas on one person per night. He can light them up only once in the game to kill them all. His goal is to be the sole survivor.
"Little girl can see during the night... Just don't know how yet ..."
